alert.note: Alert for Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 9:47AM CST until February 22 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Moultrie County in central Illinois... Northwestern Shelby County in central Illinois... * Until 1030 AM CST. * At 947 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Assumption, or 12 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Findlay around 1000 AM CST. Bethany around 1005 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sullivan, Lovington, Allenville and Arthur. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
